original_title: SHKD-595 犯され続けた美人受付嬢
overview: Saori, a receptionist who keeps smiling as the face of the company and is popular with visitors. In my private life, I was engaged to my girlfriend Shinichi and was at the height of happiness. However, it was Kazuhiro, a worker who goes in and out of the company, who was fascinated by her.
title: SHKD-595 Beautiful Receptionist Who Continued To Be Committed
